fact-5.value: On 1 June 2017, the Parent Company changed its status to a public company and was renamed to EN+ GROUP PLC. On 9 July 2019, the Parent Company changed its domicile to the Russian Federation with a registration as EN+ GROUP International public joint-stock company (EN+GROUP IPJSC).

fact-6.value: Oktyabrskaya st. 8, office 34, Kaliningrad, Kaliningrad Region, 236006, Russian Federation

fact-7.value: The Group is a leading vertically integrated aluminium and power producer, which combines the assets and results  of its Metals and Power segments

fact-8.value: East Siberia and Volga Region, the Russian Federation
